description: This table shows information for hospital accounts that are affected when tracking registration history event notes.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REG_HX_HAR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital accounts affected by the event. This column is frequently used to link to the HSP_ACCOUNT table.
